raw_body: SILVA – KAMALA (Retired Teacher,​ Royal College and Asian International School),​ much loved wife of the late Gervyn Gunasena Collure,​ precious mother of Athula (Canada),​ Shyamal (Attorney-at-Law),​ Lalyn (Australia) and Sonali (Attorney-at-Law),​ beloved mother-in-law of Chandrima (Canada),​ Dr Janaki (Pet Vet Clinic),​ Gayathri (Australia) and Ruwan Weerakoon,​ loving grandmother of Aanjalie (Canada),​ Kavindu (LSEG Technology),​ Durga,​ Vishwa and Themiya Collure (all of Australia) and darling great-grandmother of Sagan Roane (Canada) passed away peacefully. Remains will lie at the VIP Funeral Parlour,​ Mahinda Florists,​ Mt. Lavinia from 9.00 a.m. onwards for last respects on the 02nd and 03rd January. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 4.30 p.m. for Cremation at the Mt. Lavinia Cemetery at 5.00 p.m. on the 03rd January,​ 2024.000043
